    Noon

    Noon is a Rust library for generating 2D animations with simple declarative-style commands.

    A while ago, I came across manim, which was used by the author to make educational videos about math. I obviously enjoyed the videos, but I was also very impressed by the effectiveness of the animated visual contents. I was learning Rust at the time, so it only made sense to apply my learning in a project of my own . For more details, take a look at READEME.
